com.google.enterprise.connector.spi
Interface Property

All Known Implementing Classes:
SimpleProperty
public interface Property

A named, typed data item. Properties have a list of values. Most often, there is exactly one value, however some CMS's allow multiple values, so the general case is addressed here by an iterator.

Method Summary
 java.lang.String getName()
          Gets the property's name
 Value getValue()
          Gets a single value, either the first value that would have been obtained through the iterator getValues(), if it is non-null, or null
 java.util.Iterator getValues()
          Gets the values, as an iterator of Value objects
 

Method Detail

public Value getValue()
               throws RepositoryException
Gets a single value, either

Returns:
A single value, which may be null

RepositoryException

                             throws RepositoryException
